title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models for chat, completion, embeddings and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG and user management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, embeddings and custom model options.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, includes conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor; supports streaming and custom prompts.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance via the OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama (CPU & GPU) with one-line commands to serve models in containers.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library that wraps Ollama API for chat, generate and embeddings with built-in Finch HTTP client.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, multimodal, function calling and advanced integrations.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry of ready-to-run models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, Gemma, CodeLlama, etc.) with sizes and tags.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels or DMs with rate-limiting and admin controls.
